Google Map Optimization

Optimize your digital business so it can appear on top searches in the Google Map Pack.
Get Started

Place Your Google My Business Listing On Top In Google Map

Is your Google business listing facing visibility issues on Google Map? How about you get in touch with the #1 SEO Company in Kenyan so you can easily be spotted by locals. Let’s make your Google My Business listing a turning point and maximize the exposure of your organization. Searching for the right company to make your business appear in Google listings?

GET Optimized Now

Dominate Your Local Market with Expert Google My Business Optimization

Don’t allow potential prospects in your local market to slip through the cracks. Dominate your niche with Google My Business optimization and increase organic reach through Google Maps! We can optimize your listing to boost sales, enhance business loyalty, and even answer any questions you may have about our process of optimization. Let’s get started today – start getting more leads by dominating the local market!

Call Now +254 747 994 461

A Result-Driven GMB Optimization Approach

Are you tired of investing thousands of dollars in paid marketing practices and getting little but no return? What if a simple GMB optimization service can easily make you appear in front of almost 80% of your customers? Whether you’re a doctor, a lawyer, a commercial business owner or a foreman service, we can help you minimize your advertising budget to a great extent. 

By providing your readers relevant & helpful information through your Google My Business listings, we ensure your business gets significant traction from the online world. Why does GMB Optimization become increasingly important? It’s because every time a person searches a particular service + area name or code, it shows up in Google Business listings in packs of 3 in SERP. 

Optimize your Google Business listings to maximize profit returns on your website!

GET Optimized Now

Why Is GMB Optimization Important For Your Business?

We are living in a day and age where mobile usage has become significantly common. More and more people are massively interacting with the Internet through their smartphones compared to any other gadget or device. If you happen to Google a search term in your smartphone right now that relates to a specific service, you will easily be prompted with a GMB listing right after the paid ad links. Now, if your business isn’t appearing in the initial 3 pack of GMB listings, there’s a high chance you’re failing a lot of business traction in your local as well as global market! Do you know that 80% of the people use smartphones to search up businesses with the “near me” connotation? Now how about GuavyTech Solutions help you appear when they search with that intent?

Call Now +254 747 994 461

How GuavyTech Solutions Helps In Optimizing Your Google My Business Listings?

We are living in a day and age where mobile usage has become common. More and more people are massively interacting with the Internet through their smartphones compared to any other gadget or device. If you happen to Google a search term in your smartphone right now that relates to a specific service, you will easily be prompted with a GMB listing right after the paid ad links. Now, if your business isn’t appearing in the initial 3 pack of GMB listings, there’s a high chance you’re failing to bring business to your local as well as global market!

Do you know that 80% of the people use smartphones to search up businesses with the “near me” connotation? Now how about GuavyTech Solutions help you appear when they search with that intent?

GET Optimized Now

FAQs

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Google My Business or Google Map Optimization?
GMB stands for Google My Business. The process through which your GMB listing is optimized to make it appear in the first 3-pack of Google Business listings on relevant keywords is termed as Google Map or GMB optimization.
What Other Directories Are There on Which I Can Optimize My Local Business?

Although 80% of local search queries are performed on Google, there are many other relevant search directories on which your business can be optimized. Some of these local business directories include:
– Yelp
– Bizjournals.com
– Foursquare
– Bing
– Local.com
– Magic Yellow
– Freeadstime.org
– Discover Our Town

What is the Local 3 - Pack in GMB Listings?
Whenever someone searches up a relevant service on Google Search, a list of business listings appear in the pack of 3 right underneath the paid ads run on Google. It’s what we call local 3 – pack in GMB.
What is GMB/Google My Business Important for Local Business?

Local business requires local presence that stays at the top of local search results. While, 80% of the queries searched by people around the world are on Google, hence it is important to optimize your business on GMB Listings. Some of the great benefits of getting your business recognized in GMB are:

1. Enhanced brand visibility for customers
2. Easier & faster organic business reach
3. Better business exposure in online world
4. Increased website visitors and customers
